Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 16 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 12 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Lightning Breath, The Dragon exhales lightning in a line.  Each creature caught in the line takes an Average 55 Lightning damage
Other Actions.Action 3: Repulsion Breath, The Dragon exhales repulsion energy in a cone.  Each creature caught in the area makes a Strength saving throw or be pushed away from the Dragon

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Dragon can breathe air and water
